name: iac-helper
description: Infrastructure as Code helper for Terraform and Bicep. Provides validation, code generation, and documentation for Azure IaC development.
author: Copilot IaC Lab

skills.name: validate
skills.description: Validate Terraform or Bicep code for syntax errors, missing required fields, and best practice violations. Supports both full files and code snippets.

type.description: The type of IaC (terraform or bicep)

skills.name: generate
skills.description: Generate Terraform or Bicep code from a natural language description. Creates production-ready templates following Azure best practices.

description.description: Natural language description of the infrastructure to generate

type.description: The type of IaC to generate (terraform or bicep)

skills.name: explain
skills.description: Explain Terraform or Bicep resources, their properties, and best practices. Provides documentation links and usage examples.

resource.description: The resource type to explain (e.g., azurerm_kubernetes_cluster, Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts)
